intents.name: book_flight
examples: Book a flight from New York to Los Angeles for next week.
Can you arrange a flight to Tokyo for the conference?
intents.description: This intent is used to book a flight for a specified destination and date.

intents.name: reserve_hotel
examples: Reserve a hotel room in Paris for the weekend.
Book a stay at a hotel in San Francisco for next month.
intents.description: This intent is used to reserve a hotel room for a given location and date.

intents.name: order_food
examples: Order a pizza from the local pizzeria.
Can you get Chinese takeout for dinner tonight?
intents.description: This intent is used to place a food order from a specified restaurant or cuisine.

intents.name: schedule_meeting
examples: Schedule a meeting with the sales team for tomorrow.
Set up a conference call with the project managers next Friday.
intents.description: This intent is used to schedule a new meeting or conference call.

intents.name: track_package
examples: Track the package I ordered from Amazon.
Can you check the status of my delivery from FedEx?
intents.description: This intent is used to track the status of a package or shipment.

intents.name: update_profile
examples: Update my profile picture and contact details.
Change my email address and phone number in the system.
intents.description: This intent is used to update personal profile information.

intents.name: create_task
examples: Create a new task to complete the quarterly report.
Add a task to follow up with the client about the proposal.
intents.description: This intent is used to create a new task with specific details.
